dcterms:description: Dataset on perovskite solar cell powered electrochromic batteries for smart windows, highlighting their application in energy-efficient building technologies.

dcterms:description: Editorial summarizing a decade of advancements in perovskite photovoltaics, providing context for the evolution of this technology.
